name: Call for Research Articles by JSWEP
content: We invite academicians, researchers, and practitioners to submit research articles for April 2018 Issue (Volume 3; Issue 2) through our 'Submit Manuscript' Link on this website or simply send it as an email attachment (Word File) along with a covering letter to editorjswep@gmail.com â€‹Deadline to submit full article: 28th February 2018.
organizers: Journal of Social Work Education and Practice
